Free $: Broadly limited free version. Advanced features are provided for free to students and education professionals.
Permanent (DOI): A DOI can only be obtained when integrating to other services that can mint DOI (e.g. Zenodo, OSF).
Storage limits: 100MB per file, 500MB per private repository (2GB for paid accounts). 100GB for public repositories. Larger files (up to 2GB) can be attached to releases
25GB for private projects, up to 5GB per file, plus partner add-ons, 50GB for public projects

GitHub Integration: Can link to individual files (not entire repo); not really integrated

Storage limits: 15GB free, up to 100GB with Google One
1MB for individual .tex, 50MB for individual files, unlimited project size
via Binder: no hard limit, but suggests no files >100MB, can also store on GitHub or Google Colab
